DOC.brief_summary: A Long-term Follow-up Study for Cardiac Safety in the Patients with HER2 Positive Early or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer Who Have Completed the SB3-G31-BC
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Follow-up Study for Cardiac Safety in the Patients With HER2 (+) Breast Cancer Who Have Completed the SB3-G31-BC
DOC.criteria: Subjects have completed the study treatment of SB3G31BC. Subjects must provide informed consent. Subjects unwilling to follow the study requirements are not eligible for the study.
